short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close all tabs in window except for current one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close any tabs in the current window by choosing to close all but the current tab, all tabs to the left of the current one - as well as to the right - and finally show all open tabs to choose manually which to close and which to keep.
